definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: In the deeper stages of non-REM sleep brain activity is slower.
sentences.chinese: 在非快速眼动睡眠期的更深层阶段，脑活动较慢一点。

sentences.english: The researchers called the condition "REM without atonia" or REM-A.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员把这一状态称为“张力缺失的快速眼动”。

sentences.english: People with depression often experience more REM sleep than non-depressed people.
sentences.chinese: 那些情绪沮丧的人通常会经历更多的快速眼动睡眠期。

sentences.english: Here’s an eye-tracking study that demonstrates this.
sentences.chinese: 这里是一份描述这个的眼动跟踪研究。

sentences.english: When you awaken from REM sleep, you’ll feel refreshed and alert.
sentences.chinese: 当你从眼动睡眠中被唤醒的话，你会感觉到神清气爽。

sentences.english: The present experiment investigated whether the processing of pronouns is affected by the lexical frequency of their antecedents.
sentences.chinese: 采用眼动分析法考察先行词词频对代词加工的影响。

sentences.english: Cataplexy can be reduced by antidepressant drugs, which suppress rapid eye movement sleep.
sentences.chinese: 猝倒可以减少抗抑郁药物，抑制快速眼动睡眠。

sentences.english: Using ASL 501 Model eye-tracker system, the study investigated the characteristics of the cognitive processing of Advertisement information.
sentences.chinese: 采用眼动记录法探讨了广告信息的认知加工特点。

sentences.english: And blood pressure drugs as well as antidepressants are also well known REM suppressants.
sentences.chinese: 血压控制的药物和抗抑郁药物也会阻止快速眼动。

sentences.english: Eye movement behavior in reading can reflect on-line cognitive process.
sentences.chinese: 采用眼动记录法探讨了广告信息的认知加工特点。
第二种就是快速眼动睡眠。

sentences.english: Then REM sleep emerges, rapid eye movement sleep.
sentences.chinese: 这时就进入REM快速眼动睡眠。

pinyin: shi4 jian4 xiang1 guan1 dian4 wei4
gong1 neng2 xing4 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4
